debugging-question3_key1: Iss program ko attempt karne ke liye pehle ek `users.json` naam ki `file` mein neeche diye hue text ko `save` karein.
debugging-question3_key2: Uske baad aapne jiss directory mein `users.json` `save` kiya hai, usse directory mein yeh `python` ka `code` `save` kariye ek dusri `file` mein.
debugging-question3_key3: `users.json` `file` mein users ka data padha hai. Yeh program `users.json` `file` ko read kar kar usmein se users ka data print karega. Iss `file` ko debug kar kar run karo.
